mapper.select: select r.*, m.* from reservation r, member m where r.MB_num=m.MB_num and r.RSV_confirm='Y' and r.RSV_mConfirm='Y' and r.CP_num=#{CP_num}
mapper.insert: insert into reservation values ((SELECT NVL(MAX(RSV_num), 0) + 1 as RSV_num FROM reservation), 'Y', 'N', #{MB_num}, #{CP_num})
mapper.select: select * from (select r.*, m.MB_gender, m.MB_nickName from reservation r, member m where r.MB_num=m.MB_num) where CP_num=#{CP_num} order by RSV_num
select * from reservation where CP_num=#{CP_num} and MB_num=#{MB_num}
select count(*) from reservation where CP_num=#{CP_num}
mapper.update: update reservation set RSV_mConfirm='Y' where CP_num=#{CP_num} and MB_num=#{MB_num}
update reservation set RSV_confirm='N' where CP_num=#{CP_num} and MB_num=#{MB_num}
mapper.select: select rv.*, m.MB_nickName, m.MB_gender from reservation rv, member m where rv.MB_num=m.MB_num and rv.CP_num=#{CP_num}

select count(*) from (select a.*, rowNum rn from (select rv.*, c.CP_startPoint, c.CP_endPoint from reservation rv, carpool c where rv.CP_num=c.CP_num
and ${search} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
order by c.CP_num desc) a)
mapper.update: update reservation set RSV_CONFIRM='N' where CP_num=#{CP_num} and RSV_CONFIRM='Y' and RSV_MCONFIRM='N'
mapper.delete: delete from reservation where CP_num=#{CP_num} and MB_num=#{MB_num} and RSV_CONFIRM='Y' and RSV_MCONFIRM='N'
mapper.select: select * from (select a.*, rowNum rn from (select rv.*, c.CP_startPoint, c.CP_endPoint from reservation rv, carpool c where rv.CP_num=c.CP_num order by c.CP_num desc) a) where rn between 1 and 6
